rules.label: AI Roles
rules.remediation: GOVERN 1.2: Define specific roles for the AI lifecycle.

evidence.description: A documented definition of roles across the AI lifecycle, naming specific individuals or functions responsible for each phase. Must not be a generic RACI that predates the AI system â€” must reflect the actual system's governance structure.

fields.name: role_name
fields.description: The name or title of the defined role.

fields.name: responsible_party
fields.description: The individual, team, or function assigned to this role.

fields.name: lifecycle_phase
fields.description: The AI lifecycle phase this role governs.

fields.name: last_reviewed
fields.description: Date this role definition was last reviewed.

evidence.producer_role: AI Program Manager or Designated Risk Owner

rules.label: Accountability Structure
rules.remediation: GOVERN 1.2: Define accountability chains for system outcomes.

rules.label: System Context
rules.remediation: MAP 1.1: Document the context and business goals of the system.

evidence.description: A documented description of the AI system's operational context, intended use cases, and business objectives. Must be specific to this system. Must include the deployment environment and the population of users or subjects affected.

fields.name: system_name
fields.description: The name of the AI system this context describes.

fields.name: business_goal
fields.description: The primary business objective this system serves.

fields.name: deployment_context
fields.description: Where and how the system is deployed.

fields.name: last_reviewed
fields.description: Date this context document was last reviewed.

rules.label: Impact Analysis
rules.remediation: MAP 1.1: Analyze potential negative impacts on stakeholders.

evidence.description: A documented analysis of potential negative impacts on individuals, groups, or society resulting from system failures, misuse, or unintended outputs. Must identify specific affected stakeholder groups and rate impact severity.

fields.name: impact_domain
fields.description: The domain of potential negative impact.

fields.name: affected_stakeholders
fields.description: The specific groups or individuals who could be negatively affected.

fields.name: severity_rating
fields.description: The assessed severity of potential negative impact.

fields.name: last_reviewed
fields.description: Date this impact assessment was last reviewed.

rules.label: Bias Metrics
rules.remediation: MEASURE 2.2: Define specific metrics used to quantify bias.

evidence.description: Results from a bias evaluation run against the deployed or candidate model. Must include the metric name, computed value, evaluation date, and tool used. Must be actual evaluation output, not a description of intended evaluation.

fields.name: metric_name
fields.description: The name of the bias metric computed.

fields.name: metric_value
fields.description: The computed metric value as a decimal string.

fields.name: evaluation_date
fields.description: The date the evaluation was run.

fields.name: evaluation_tool
fields.description: The tool or library used to compute the metric.

rules.label: Incident Response
rules.remediation: MANAGE 2.3: Detail specific steps to respond to AI incidents.

evidence.description: A documented incident response plan specific to AI system failures. A general IT incident response plan is not sufficient without an AI-specific annex.

fields.name: plan_version
fields.description: The version identifier of the incident response plan.

fields.name: ai_specific_scenarios
fields.description: List of AI-specific incident scenarios the plan addresses.

fields.name: response_owner
fields.description: The role or team responsible for executing the plan.

fields.name: last_reviewed
fields.description: Date the plan was last reviewed and approved.

evidence.producer_role: AI Program Manager or Security Lead

rules.label: Decommissioning
rules.remediation: MANAGE 1.3: Plan for system decommissioning or model retirement.

evidence.description: A documented plan for retiring the AI system or model.

red_flags.label: Black Box Arch
red_flags.remediation: NIST RMF emphasizes Explainability. Avoid 'black box' architectures without interpretability layers.

red_flags.label: No Eval Planned
red_flags.remediation: Continuous validation is core to the NIST RMF Measure function.
